headline: Piper Sandler Flags Near-Term Uncertainty for Zoetis (ZTS) Despite Long-Term Appeal
summary: Zoetis Inc. (NYSE:ZTS) is included among the 12 Most Profitable Dividend Stocks to Buy in 2026. On January 22, Piper Sandler downgraded Zoetis Inc. (NYSE:ZTS) to Neutral from Overweight. It also slashed its price target to $135 from $190. The firm said it still likes Zoetis’ product portfolio over the long run, but sees too […]
